SCP261:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SCP261:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SCP261:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SCP261:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SCP261:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SCP261:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SCP261:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SCP261:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SCP261:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theDefault:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SCP261:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SCP261:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theDefault:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
